meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points having the same temperature.
meanings.sent1: The isotheres on the map show where it is equally hot.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use isotheres to understand temperature patterns across regions.
meanings.sent3: The isotheres on the map decided to throw a party at the equator.
meanings.sent4: The isotheres danced across the map, linking all the warm spots together.
meanings.sent5: The isotheres acted like colorful threads stitching the temperature map together.

meanings.definition: A curve on a graph representing a constant temperature.
meanings.sent1: The isotheres on the graph remained flat, indicating a steady temperature.
meanings.sent2: In meteorology, isotheres help visualize temperature changes over time.
meanings.sent3: The isotheres on the graph decided to take a break and form a temperature band.
meanings.sent4: The isotheres on the graph stood out like bold lines in a sea of data.
meanings.sent5: The isotheres on the graph painted a clear picture of the temperature trend.
